name: Good things come in trees.
description:
A scary bird kidnapped your siblings and now they are stuck in a tree. Use you telekinetic powers to move the branches of the tree in order to clear your path and reach the top.
Controls (Are in game)
A and D go left and right
W jump
SPACEBAR to choose which branch you want to move.
Arrows, to move the chosen branch.

There may be updates, fixing some things, adding more levels and branches in the future.
As a matter of respect, it is important to say the user Bangiras (http://bangiras.itch.io/)worked here too.
